articles.title: About:
articles.description:
My research work primarily focusses on the interaction betweeen attention and consiousness experience.
Currently, I am a D.Phil student at the [Centre of Behavioural and Cognitive Sciences (CBCS), University of Allahabad, India](https://cbcs.ac.in/) and I can be reached at saravana@cbcs.ac.in or priyantsau@gmail.com
articles.contents: Visit my twitter page at: priyan.ts
